recommendations.title: Develop and implement AI standards for priority sectors
Implement specialised AI regulatory sandboxes and pilot zones
Enhance regulations around synthetic content generation
Refresh the National AI Strategy to meet evolving priorities
Broaden the establishment of AI offices within the public sector
Enhance data collection and data sharing capabilities
Embed AI across general and higher education curricula
Introduce global AI talent attraction programs
Deploy comprehensive, nationwide AI upskilling programs
Establish AI centres of excellence in national priority areas
Strengthen National AI research and innovation ecosystem
Catalyse the development of Arabic language technologies
Promote diversity and inclusion in AI and digital sectors
Address digital gender gaps in STEM and AI
Assess the impact of AI on culture
Establish guidelines for environmental impact monitoring
Advance AI investment and startup ecosystem
